SKT_FIRST.name: Dead Man's Party
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>65%</color> chance to reduce the targets' <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks 2 enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000043_1_1]</color> chance to reduce the targets' <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000043_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Fool's Paradise
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from the target. If the target is Earth element inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Changes to Single Attack\nGreatly increases damage\nIncreased Effectiveness + 2 turns

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\nRemoves Buffs â–¸ Steals Buff

description: Attacks 2 enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000043_2_1]</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000043_2_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from the target. If the target is Earth element inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000043_2_2] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: No One Lives Forever
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Reduced Defense</color>, and <color=#28d9ed>Reduced Speed </color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. Additionally, has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> on Earth targets for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks 2 enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000043_3_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Reduced Defense</color>, and <color=#28d9ed>Reduced Speed </color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000043_3_1] turn(s)</color>. Additionally, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000043_3_3]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> on Earth targets for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000043_3_3] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Find Weakness</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Find Weakness</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000043_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000043_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000043_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.
